docs.snippet: Another two decades of neo-liberal, reward-the-rich politics will lead to a breakdown in society.

docs.snippet: A report published by European officials said that only 40 percent of online material flagged as offensive was reviewed within 24 hours.

docs.snippet: By publishing fake news and disrupting standards of truth and civility, tech companies allowed Trump to spread his message.

docs.snippet: As witnessed in the presidential election, social networks and alternative media represent a new platform leveling the playing field with traditional news media.

docs.snippet: Last month American Jews cheered a demagogue. This is the wrong moment to forget.
